IAQueryTemplate: INSERT INTO advicewithpo(Retailer, `Email Date`, `Sender Email Address`, `Email Subject`, Filename, SN, `IA FID`, `IA VID`, `IA Vendor Name`, `IA Vendor Telephone`, `IA Factory Name (in English)`, `IA Factory Name (in Chinese)`, `IA Factory Location (in English)`, `IA Factory Location (in Chinese)`, `IA Factory Contact Person`, `IA Factory Telephone`, `IA PO #`, `Re-inspection`, `IA Type of Inspection`, `IA Request Inspection Date`, `IA Request Date Accept`, `IA Multi Factory`, `IA Item No`, `IA Quantity`, `Special Program`, `Total IA Count`, `Count PO`, SourceFile, ImportStatus, ImportDate) VALUES ('@'Retailer'@', '@'Email Date'@', '@'Sender Email Address'@', '@'Email Subject'@', '@'Filename'@', '@'SN'@', '@'IA FID'@', '@'IA VID'@', '@'IA Vendor Name'@', '@'IA Vendor Telephone'@', '@'IA Factory Name (in English)'@', '@'IA Factory Name (in Chinese)'@', '@'IA Factory Location (in English)'@', '@'IA Factory Location (in Chinese)'@', '@'IA Factory Contact Person'@', '@'IA Factory Telephone'@', '@'IA PO #'@', '@'Re-inspection'@', '@'IA Type of Inspection'@', '@'IA Request Inspection Date'@', '', '@'IA Multi Factory'@', '@'IA Item No'@', '@'IA Quantity'@', '@'Special Program'@', '', '', '@'Filename'@', '2', NOW())
optIAlogTemplate: INSERT INTO optattachmentrecieved(OptAttachmentRecievedID, RecievedTime, SenderEmailAddress, Subject, AttachmentFileName, SavedFileName, ImportResult, ImportErrorMessage, PreparedFileName, ExecutionTime, ExecuteBy, Remark)	VALUES ('@'guid'@', NOW(), '@'Sender Email Address'@', '@'Email Subject'@','@'AttachmentFileName'@', '@'Filename'@', '@'ImportResult'@', '@'ImportErrorMessage'@', '', NOW(), '', '')
IAMacroSnippet: Please correct errors in red before saving!
